doc.field: Communist Party of the United States of America Records
Communist Party of the United States of America Records

Photographs in this series contain images of public demonstrations, affiliated groups, and collected photographs on a wide variety of topics. Photographs of events and demonstrations document Communist Party regional activities, as well as activities of labor groups and other organization on the political left. Photographs in this subseries were both collected, rather than produced, by the CPUSA, and provide a glimpse into the array of topics of interest to the Party. Among these materials are collected prints created by various photographers documenting topics like rural life in Latin America, working-class people in New York City, and labor demonstrations. Other photographs document events in communist nations including the Soviet Union, North Korea, China, and Eastern European Soviet satellite nations. Images documenting CPUSA activities include images of Party leaders, meetings, and various demonstrations.
Communist Party of the United States of America Records
